name: Go Go Gamebert 3
description:
Grim shadows have cloaked  the Kingdom of Gamingfurt in darkness. Gamebert's evil twin brother Lamebert has sent masses of Brixx to cover the stratosphere.

Destroy Lamebert's  Brixx with the help of Gamebert and his Super Console, and rescue Gamingfurt honourably by reaching the highest score! You will be tempted to use special tricks to gain more points and win but always ask yourself, is what you have to go through in order to be the best really worth it?

Controls
← = "A"
→ = "D"


This game was created during the 6th Klagenfurt Winter Game Jam in 2022.

A CtrlZ Games Collective Game
Benjamin Hanussek: Design & Sound
Tom Tucek: Programming & Design
Nick Markozov: Visual Art
Adriana: Additional Art Assets

Bibliography
Breakout (Atari 1976)
Funky Town (Lipps Inc. 1979)

Haven't played the other parts of the famous GGG franchise yet?
Go and check out the groundbreaking debut Go Go Gamebert! and its critically appraised sequel Go Go Gamebert! 2! Play NOW!
